name: The Happy Path
description:
"I just can't recommend playing this game…"

"Okay, WTF is this?"

"OMG, this game sucks dolphin feet 🤦‍♀️"

The Happy Path is a wild adventure, following a little guy through a small world filled with deception and trickery.

◯ Two greatly designed 3D levels
◯ A whole bunch of fiendish pitfalls and traps
◯ Multiple paths to go
◯ Three hidden secrets!!
◯ Full Analog Controller support

Die, fail, start over, die again, discover useless things, and eventually throw your computer out the window because the game just pisses you off in this little platform adventure made by the Feierabend Crew.

🎮 Controller recommended

"You really want me to say it out loud, don't you?
I HATE this game!!"
